nodes.text: Pippip 3 was a planet and the homeworld of the human Resistance pilot Tallissan Lintra. It was populated by creatures such as dire hounds and whellays.

Sometime after the Galactic Civil War, Lintra's parents established a farm on Pippip 3, where the young pilot used her father's old RZ-1 A-wing interceptor as a cropduster. Later, during the evacuation of D'Qar amidst the First Order/Resistance War, Lintra remembered Pippip 3's fauna while comparing First Order TIE fighters going through the Resistance defensive formation to dire hounds loose among whellays.
Pippip 3 was first mentioned in the 2017 activity book Star Wars: A-wing Deluxe Book and 3D Wood Model, written by Michael Kogge.
